text: Under Fire is a 1983 American Mexican thriller movie directed by Roger Spottiswoode and starring Nick Nolte, Gene Hackman, Joanna Cassidy, Ed Harris, Richard Masur, Hamilton Camp, René Enríquez. It was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 thriller movies Category:1983 war movies Category:American war movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Mexican thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Spottiswoode Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in Central America Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: Under Fire (1983 movie)
